description:
Nanoha is worried about Fate. Meanwhile, Arisa and Suzuka are worried about Nanoha. Nanoha is thinking about Fate while recalling how she met her two friends. Confronted by Fate for the third time while searching for a Jewel Seed, Nanoha tells Fate her name, but...
Source: Amazon

titles.title: Is it a Feeling I Couldn`t Understand?
わかりあえない気持なの?
